attributes.review: It took 3 days to download and when it did it didn’t work. When ever I would open it, it would go black then take me back to home screen . It really doesn’t work.
attributes.title: Should take this Down

attributes.review: Two years ago I was in the darkest time of my life. I was searching for a purpose in something, but nothing worked. Not school, not drugs, not my boyfriend; I even did alcohol, but that just left me feeling even more lonely. After that I thought I would branch out, so I got involved in a Jamaican dog fighting circle, but I soon learned that that was bad news. I was lost. But it was in this pit of despair that I discovered the thing that changed my life forever. I downloaded Trumps app. At first, I was a casual supporter , reading updates every once in awhile. But as time went on, being a supporter began to take on a deeper meaning. 11 pm on a Friday night meant something completely different than a 9:30 on a Tuesday morning. Checking in on the app became something special, something meaningful. Trump transformed my life. It taught me what it meant to be a mother, how to take out a bank loan, even how to talk to people without violently vomiting. I would not be the person I am today if it wasn’t Trump and this app. Now to you out there, reading this review, thinking to yourself, “How could this stupid app ever be useful?” Give it a try. I beg of you, take a chance. You won’t regret it. Thank you, God Bless you.
attributes.title: Hear me out...

attributes.review: i really wanted to like this app.. however, it constantly crashes and bombards me with nonstop ads. it’s glitchy and is totally useless as an app.

attributes.title: No ❤️

attributes.review: Hello, I am a 37 year old white woman that was looking for a Christian dating service so that I can meet the Christian man of my dreams. I asked around and my friends referred me to this app. It looked promising because the Icon is blue (blue is my favorite color), and I have never heard of a “trump before.” Is that some type of spice? Anyways, upon opening this app I was met with my first match. He was the most vile, regurgitated, bile Cheeto I’ve ever seen in my entire life. I can’t believe that this app would match me (a very beautiful Aryan white woman) with somebody that looked like my delicately tanned anus. I am appalled. I was willing to lower my standards to find my man, but I didn’t mean this much. Anyways. This is the worst dating service I’ve ever used. 0/10 would not recommend 😞
attributes.title: Wish I could give this 0 stars
